All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.awt.event.WindowListener
public class FrameLauncher
extends java.awt.Frame
implements java.awt.event.WindowListener

Useful utility class to start a Thinlet application in AWT Frame.

See Also:

windowClosing

public void windowClosing(java.awt.event.WindowEvent e)
This method calls Thinlet.destroy(), and exits only if that method returns true. This provides a way for programmers to perform cleanup tasks on exit, or disallow exiting altogether.

Specified by:
windowClosing in interface java.awt.event.WindowListener
